mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.sender AS "sender", a.receiver AS "receiver", a.msg AS "msg", a.status AS "status", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.type AS "type"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM iim_chat_history a
AND ((a.sender = #{sender} AND a.receiver = #{receiver}) or (a.sender = #{receiver} AND a.receiver = #{sender}))
AND a.msg LIKE '%'||#{msg}||'%' '%'+#{msg}+'%' concat('%',#{msg},'%')
AND a.status = #{status}
AND a.create_date = #{createDate}
ORDER BY a.create_date desc

SELECT
FROM iim_chat_history a
AND ((a.sender = #{receiver}||'_msg_'||#{sender} #{receiver}+'_msg_'+#{sender} concat(#{receiver},'_msg_',#{sender}) AND a.receiver = #{sender})
OR (a.sender like #{receiver}||'_msg_'||'%' #{receiver}+'_msg_'+'%' concat(#{receiver},'_msg_','%') and a.receiver = #{sender}))
AND a.msg LIKE '%'||#{msg}||'%' '%'+#{msg}+'%' concat('%',#{msg},'%')
AND a.status = #{status}
AND a.create_date = #{createDate}
ORDER BY a.create_date desc

SELECT
FROM iim_chat_history a
ORDER BY a.create_date asc
